Key Match Events: Eric Wagaman scored on Jordyn Adams' infield hit in the 13th inning, giving the Angels a 4-3 victory against the Sox.

Andrew Wagaman began the 13th on second as the automatic runner and moved to third on a flyout to right. Adams hit a grounder that deflected off third baseman Miguel Vargas' glove, and Wagaman scored easily to end the marathon.
Post-Match Reflections: Interim manager Grady Sizemore said, 'We had some opportunities, just didnâ€™t capitalize on them. We just came up short.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Sox have 117 losses, inching closer to the 1962 New York Mets' record of 120 losses.
Jake Eder made his major-league debut and allowed one run on two hits with one strikeout and one walk in two innings.
Chad Kuhl found a way in a tricky spot, avoiding a run-scoring balk and striking out Taylor Ward.
